overview:
Medizza is the Social Television Company. It’s platform, Medizza TV is designed and built for scale, reliability and security in mind. Setup is streamlined from the cloud that greatly reduces costs on technology.

Medizza believes the Future of Television is Television. Itâ€™s the ecosystem that is changing and Medizza plays a role in changing it.

Medizza offers opportunities to both new and existing players. By the perfect mix of design, simplicity and openness we have implemented a strong software strategy to scale between the number of new gadgets and connected devices.

The consumer uses Medizza TV to experience entertainment content from service providers, home media and the Internet. Record every new episode of a TV series using our advanced PVR and Series Link service. Instantly pause, record or rewind all your live television programming. Access Video On Demand from various open content storefronts.

Businesses can build their own television experiences, media zones or content offerings using our powerful administration tools. Distribute content and programming on a new generation of socially empowered media devices. Foster engagement with and among the community of viewers, allowing people new ways to discover your content.

Use the open Medizza API and developers kit to design and create the experience as you dream of it. Build extensions, applications or your own media marketplace.

Build powerful TV Apps using the Medizza TV Plugable UI development framework. Place it on the home screen menu and integrate it with the core service. Build your own storefronts for your media content. A catalogue of On Demand movies or packages of TV channels. Create a truly unique media marketplace using the Medizza tools and APIs.
